content: Bienvenue sur le serveur des Molang !
Melangez la tarte et les fraises pour obtenir une tarte aux fraises.
Vous trouvez une photo de Molang a la mer. Bravo !

Hey I couldn't talk to you about this on the phone...
But I want info about a guy called Victor Young. It's important. He works for the BIG company.
I got already got his e-mail : vyoung@big.com
Check his social media profile as well (╭ರ_⊙)
www.fakebook.com/vyoung
